name: Awesome Robot Adventure
description:
Return of the classics

Our aim is to make a Metroidvania style game where the focus of power-ups is shifted to character differences instead of items.

Start alone, gather allies

You begin the game as a basic character with a small area to explore and you need to find certain other characters to unlock more areas and new mechanics.

Explore new horizons

With finding new characters you will have access to new game mechanics, so new areas open up. As time goes by the explorable area opens up more with new and more difficult enemies.

Get ready for the challenge

To progress smoothly with the game, the player is expected to master the new mechanics brought by the new characters. It is possible for the player to go and fight the final boss directly after tutorial area, however doing so will be near impossible without progressing and unlocking other characters.
